verses.verse: וַיַּאַסְפ֨וּ <WH622> gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <WH6430> Now the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <WH4264> their armies לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to battle וַיֵּאָ֣סְפ֔וּ <WH622> and were gathered together שֹׂכֹ֖ה <WH7755> at Shochoh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לִיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [belongeth] to Judah וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <WH2583> and pitched בֵּין־ <WH996> between שׂוֹכֹ֥ה <WH7755> between Shochoh וּבֵין־ <WH996> between עֲזֵקָ֖ה <WH5825> and Azekah בְּאֶ֥פֶס דַּמִּֽים׃ <WH658> in Ephesdammim

וְשָׁא֤וּל <WH7586> And Saul וְאִֽישׁ־ <WH376> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel נֶאֶסְפ֔וּ <WH622> were gathered together וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> by the valley הָאֵלָ֑ה <WH425> of Elah וַיַּעַרְכ֥וּ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> and set the battle לִקְרַ֥את <WH7122> to encounter פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> the Philistines

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <WH6430> And the Philistines עֹמְדִ֤ים <WH5975> stood אֶל־ <WH413> on הָהָר֙ <WH2022> on a mountain מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> one וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> on the one side and Israel עֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> stood אֶל־ <WH413> on הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> on a mountain מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> side וְהַגַּ֖יְא <WH1516> on the other side and [there was] a valley בֵּינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH996> between

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> And there went out אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> he הַבֵּנַ֙יִם֙ <WH1143> champion מִמַּחֲנ֣וֹת <WH4264> out of the camp פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines גָּלְיָ֥ת <WH1555> Goliath שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> named מִגַּ֑ת <WH1661> of Gath גָּבְה֕וֹ <WH1363> whose height שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> [was] six אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits וָזָֽרֶת׃ <WH2239> and a span

וְכ֤וֹבַע <WH3553> And [he had] an helmet נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> of brass עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וְשִׁרְי֥וֹן <WH8302> with a coat קַשְׂקַשִּׂ֖ים <WH7193> of mail ה֣וּא <WH1931> and he לָב֑וּשׁ <WH3847> and he [was] armed וּמִשְׁקַל֙ <WH4948> and the weight הַשִּׁרְי֔וֹן <WH8302> of the coat חֲמֵשֶׁת־ <WH2568> [was] five אֲלָפִ֥ים <WH505> thousand שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels נְחֹֽשֶֽׁת׃ <WH5178> of brass

וּמִצְחַ֥ת <WH4697> And [he had] greaves נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass עַל־ <WH5921> on רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> upon his legs וְכִיד֥וֹן <WH3591> and a target נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between כְּתֵפָֽיו׃ <WH3802> between his shoulders

[וְחָץ כ] (וְעֵ֣ץ <WH2671> archer ק) חֲנִית֗וֹ <WH2595> of his spear כִּמְנוֹר֙ <WH4500> beam אֹֽרְגִ֔ים <WH707> [was] like a weaver's וְלַהֶ֣בֶת <WH3852> head חֲנִית֔וֹ <WH2595> and his spear's שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [weighed] six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels בַּרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> of iron וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> and one bearing הַצִּנָּ֖ה <WH6793> a shield הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> went לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <WH5975> And he stood וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and cried אֶל־ <WH413> to מַעַרְכֹ֣ת <WH4634> unto the armies יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֔ם לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תֵצְא֖וּ <WH3318> unto them Why are ye come out לַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to set [your] battle הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> not הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗י <WH6430> ? [am] not I a Philistine וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> and you עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> and ye servants לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> Saul בְּרוּ־ <WH1262> choose לָכֶ֥ם אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> you a man וְיֵרֵ֥ד <WH3381> for you and let him come down אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

אִם־ <WH518> If יוּכַ֞ל <WH3201> If he be able לְהִלָּחֵ֤ם <WH3898> to fight אִתִּי֙ <WH854> for וְהִכָּ֔נִי <WH5221> with me and to kill וְהָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> will become לָכֶ֖ם לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> me then will we be your servants וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֽוּכַל־ <WH3201> but if I prevail לוֹ֙ וְהִכִּיתִ֔יו <WH5221> against him and kill וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <WH1961> shall become לָ֙נוּ֙ לַעֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> him then shall ye be our servants וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH5647> and serve אֹתָֽנוּ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> And the Philistine אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I חֵרַ֛פְתִּי <WH2778> I defy אֶת־ <WH853> מַעַרְכ֥וֹת <WH4634> the armies יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> give לִ֣י אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> me a man וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <WH3898> that we may fight יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> together

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> When Saul וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and all Israel אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> those words הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> of the Philistine הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֵּחַ֥תּוּ <WH2865> they were dismayed וַיִּֽרְא֖וּ <WH3372> afraid מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and greatly פ

וְדָוִד֩ <WH1732> Now David בֶּן־ <WH1121> [was] the son אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and the man אֶפְרָתִ֜י <WH673> of the Ephrathite הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> he מִבֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> of Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> whose name יִשַׁ֔י <WH3448> [was] Jesse וְל֖וֹ שְׁמֹנָ֣ה <WH8083> and he had eight בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> sons וְהָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> men בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> in the days שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul זָקֵ֖ן <WH2204> [for] an old man בָּ֥א <WH935> went בַאֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH376> men

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> that went שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> And the three בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons יִשַׁי֙ <WH3448> of Jesse הַגְּדֹלִ֔ים <WH1419> eldest הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> went אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> [and] followed שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to the battle וְשֵׁ֣ם ׀ <WH8034> and the names שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> of his three בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> sons אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הָלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to the battle אֱלִיאָ֣ב <WH446> [were] Eliab הַבְּכ֗וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn וּמִשְׁנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4932> and next אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <WH41> unto him Abinadab וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖י <WH7992> and the third שַׁמָּֽה׃ <WH8048> Shammah

וְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הַקָּטָ֑ן <WH6996> [was] the youngest וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> and the three הַגְּדֹלִ֔ים <WH1419> eldest הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after that שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> Saul ס

וְדָוִ֛ד <WH1732> But David הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> went וָשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> and returned מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> from Saul לִרְע֛וֹת <WH7462> to feed אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> sheep אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father's בֵּֽית־ לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> at Bethlehem

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> drew near הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> And the Philistine הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> morning וְהַעֲרֵ֑ב <WH6150> and evening וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> and presented אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> himself forty יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יִשַׁ֜י <WH3448> And Jesse לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> unto David בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son קַח־ <WH3947> Take נָ֤א <WH4994> now לְאַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> now for thy brethren אֵיפַ֤ת <WH374> an ephah הַקָּלִיא֙ <WH7039> parched הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this וַעֲשָׂרָ֥ה <WH6235> [corn] and these ten לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> loaves הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> and these וְהָרֵ֥ץ <WH7323> and run הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> to the camp לְאַחֶֽיךָ׃ <WH251> to thy brethren

וְ֠אֵת <WH853> עֲשֶׂ֜רֶת <WH6235> these ten חֲרִצֵ֤י <WH2757> cuts הֶֽחָלָב֙ <WH2461> of cheese הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these תָּבִ֖יא <WH935> And carry לְשַׂר־ <WH8269> unto the captain הָאָ֑לֶף <WH505> of [their] thousand וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> how thy brethren תִּפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> and look לְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> fare וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲרֻבָּתָ֖ם <WH6161> their pledge תִּקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> and take

וְשָׁא֤וּל <WH7586> Now Saul וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> and they וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> another יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> [were] in the valley הָֽאֵלָ֑ה <WH425> of Elah נִלְחָמִ֖ים <WH3898> fighting עִם־ <WH5973> with פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> with the Philistines

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose up early דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּטֹּ֤שׁ <WH5203> and left אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> the sheep עַל־ <WH5921> with שֹׁמֵ֔ר <WH8104> with a keeper וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> and took וַיֵּ֔לֶךְ <WH1980> and went כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> had commanded יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> as Jesse וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> him and he came הַמַּעְגָּ֔לָה <WH4570> to the trench וְהַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> as the host הַיֹּצֵא֙ <WH3318> was going forth אֶל־ <WH413> in הַמַּ֣עֲרָכָ֔ה <WH4634> to the fight וְהֵרֵ֖עוּ <WH7321> and shouted בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> for the battle

וַתַּעֲרֹ֤ךְ <WH6186> had put the battle in array יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> For Israel וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> and the Philistines מַעֲרָכָ֖ה <WH4634> army לִקְרַ֥את <WH7122> against מַעֲרָכָֽה׃ <WH4634> army

וַיִּטֹּשׁ֩ <WH5203> left דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֜ים <WH3627> his carriage מֵעָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and עַל־ <WH5921> in יַד֙ <WH3027> in the hand שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> of the keeper הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> of the carriage וַיָּ֖רָץ <WH7323> and ran הַמַּעֲרָכָ֑ה <WH4634> into the army וַיָּבֹ֕א <WH935> and came וַיִּשְׁאַ֥ל <WH7592> ask counsel לְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> his brethren לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> favor

וְה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> he מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And as he talked עִמָּ֗ם <WH5973> them וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he הַבֵּנַ֡יִם <WH1143> champion עוֹלֶ֞ה <WH5927> with them behold there came up גָּלְיָת֩ <WH1555> Goliath הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֨י <WH6430> the Philistine שְׁמ֤וֹ <WH8034> by name מִגַּת֙ <WH1661> of Gath [מִמַּעֲרֹות כ] (מִמַּעַרְכֹ֣ות <WH4630> army ק) פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and spake כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> according to the same וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> and David

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּרְאוֹתָ֖ם <WH7200> when they saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> the man וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <WH5127> fled מִפָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> from him וַיִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> afraid מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> and were sore

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הַרְּאִיתֶם֙ <WH7200> Have ye seen הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> this man הָֽעֹלֶה֙ <WH5927> that is come up הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֛י <WH3588> Surely לְחָרֵ֥ף <WH2778> ? surely to defy אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel עֹלֶ֑ה <WH5927> is he come up וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become הָאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and it shall be [that] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַכֶּ֜נּוּ <WH5221> who killeth יַעְשְׁרֶ֥נּוּ <WH6238> will enrich הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <WH4428> him the king עֹ֣שֶׁר <WH6239> riches גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> him with great וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּתּוֹ֙ <WH1323> him his daughter יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> and will give ל֔וֹ וְאֵת֙ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father's יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> and make חָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> free בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <WH582> to the men הָעֹמְדִ֣ים <WH5975> that stood עִמּוֹ֮ <WH5973> with לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> by him saying מַה־ <WH4100> What יֵּעָשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> What shall be done לָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> to the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יַכֶּה֙ <WH5221> that killeth אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֣י <WH6430> Philistine הַלָּ֔ז <WH1975> this וְהֵסִ֥יר <WH5493> and taketh away חֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH2781> the reproach מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מִ֗י <WH4310> any הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֤י <WH6430> Philistine הֶֽעָרֵל֙ <WH6189> uncircumcised הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> is this כִּ֣י <WH3588> should חֵרֵ֔ף <WH2778> that he should defy מַעַרְכ֖וֹת <WH4634> the armies אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> angels חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> answered לוֹ֙ הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And the people כַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> him after this manner הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> So shall it be done לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> to the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַכֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH5221> that killeth

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard אֱלִיאָב֙ <WH446> And Eliab אָחִ֣יו <WH251> brother הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> his eldest בְּדַבְּר֖וֹ <WH1696> when he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> the men וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַף֩ <WH639> anger אֱלִיאָ֨ב <WH446> and Eliab's בְּדָוִ֜ד <WH1732> against David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and he said לָמָּה־ <WH4100> Why זֶּ֣ה <WH2088> have you יָרַ֗דְתָּ <WH3381> Why camest thou down וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מִ֨י <WH4310> have you נָטַ֜שְׁתָּ <WH5203> hither? and with whom hast thou left מְעַ֨ט <WH4592> few הַצֹּ֤אן <WH6629> sheep הָהֵ֙נָּה֙ <WH2007> those בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> desert אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> acknowledge אֶת־ <WH853> זְדֹנְךָ֗ <WH2087> thy pride וְאֵת֙ <WH853> רֹ֣עַ <WH7455> and the naughtiness לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> of thine heart כִּ֗י <WH3588> in לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order רְא֥וֹת <WH7200> that thou mightest see הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> the battle יָרָֽדְתָּ׃ <WH3381> for thou art come down

וַיְּשָּֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> were heard הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> And when the words אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> which David וַיַּגִּ֥דוּ <WH5046> they rehearsed לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> [them] before שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul וַיִּקָּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH3947> and he sent

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> to Saul אַל־ <WH408> no יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> fail לֵב־ <WH3820> heart אָדָ֖ם <WH120> Let no man's עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> account עַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> because of him thy servant יֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> will go וְנִלְחַ֖ם <WH3898> and fight עִם־ <WH5973> with הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֥י <WH6430> with this Philistine הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> against דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> to David לֹ֤א <WH3808> are not תוּכַל֙ <WH3201> Thou art not able לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to go אֶל־ <WH413> against הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֣י <WH6430> against this Philistine הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נַ֣עַר <WH5288> with him for thou [art but] a youth אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וְה֛וּא <WH1931> and he אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and he a man מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war מִנְּעֻרָֽיו׃ <WH5271> from his youth ס

וְיָצָ֧אתִי <WH3318> And I went out אַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> after וְהִכִּתִ֖יו <WH5221> him and smote וְהִצַּ֣לְתִּי <WH5337> him and delivered מִפִּ֑יו <WH6310> [it] out of his mouth וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> and when he arose עָלַ֔י <WH5921> against וְהֶחֱזַ֙קְתִּי֙ <WH2388> against me I caught בִּזְקָנ֔וֹ <WH2206> [him] by his beard וְהִכִּתִ֖יו <WH5221> and smote וַהֲמִיתִּֽיו׃ <WH4191> him and slew

גַּ֧ם <WH1571> both אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָאֲרִ֛י <WH738> both the lion גַּם־ <WH1571> both הַדּ֖וֹב <WH1677> and the bear הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> slew עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> Thy servant וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֨י <WH6430> Philistine הֶעָרֵ֤ל <WH6189> and this uncircumcised הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> and this כְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> shall be as one מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> of them כִּ֣י <WH3588> since חֵרֵ֔ף <WH2778> of them seeing he hath defied מַעַרְכֹ֖ת <WH4634> the armies אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said דָּוִד֒ <WH1732> David יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> moreover The LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הִצִּלַ֜נִי <WH5337> that delivered מִיַּ֤ד <WH3027> me out of the paw הָֽאֲרִי֙ <WH738> of the lion וּמִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> and out of the paw הַדֹּ֔ב <WH1677> of the bear ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יַצִּילֵ֔נִי <WH5337> he will deliver מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> me out of the hand הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> of this Philistine הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֤וּל <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> unto David לֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> Go וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> And he took מַקְל֜וֹ <WH4731> his staff בְּיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיִּבְחַר־ <WH977> and chose ל֣וֹ חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> him five חַלֻּקֵֽי־ <WH2512> smooth אֲבָנִ֣ים ׀ <WH68> stones מִן־ <WH4480> from הַנַּ֡חַל <WH5158> out of the brook וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> and put אֹ֠תָם <WH853> בִּכְלִ֨י <WH3627> bag הָרֹעִ֧ים <WH7462> them in a shepherd's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֛וֹ וּבַיַּלְק֖וּט <WH3219> which he had even in a scrip וְקַלְּע֣וֹ <WH7050> and his sling בְיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> [was] in his hand וַיִּגַּ֖שׁ <WH5066> and he drew near אֶל־ <WH413> about הַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH6430> to the Philistine

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> on הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> And the Philistine הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> came וְקָרֵ֖ב <WH7131> and drew near אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> unto David וְהָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and the man נֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> that bare הַצִּנָּ֖ה <WH6793> the shield לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> [went] before

וַיַּבֵּ֧ט <WH5027> looked about הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֛י <WH6430> And when the Philistine וַיִּרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David וַיִּבְזֵ֑הוּ <WH959> he disdained כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become נַ֔עַר <WH5288> him for he was [but] a youth וְאַדְמֹנִ֖י <WH132> and ruddy עִם־ <WH5973> with יְפֵ֥ה <WH3303> and of a fair מַרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> countenance

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הַפְּלִשְׁתִּי֙ <WH6430> And the Philistine אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> unto David הֲכֶ֣לֶב <WH3611> [Am] I a dog אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you בָֽא־ <WH935> that thou comest אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about בַּמַּקְל֑וֹת <WH4731> rod וַיְקַלֵּ֧ל <WH7043> cursed הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֛י <WH6430> the Philistine אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David בֵּאלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> by his gods

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> And the Philistine אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> to David לְכָ֣ה <WH1980> Come אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me וְאֶתְּנָה֙ <WH5414> to me and I will give אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1320> thy flesh לְע֥וֹף <WH5775> unto the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the air וּלְבֶהֱמַ֥ת <WH929> and to the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David אֶל־ <WH413> to הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> to the Philistine אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You בָּ֣א <WH935> Thou comest אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בְּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> to me with a sword וּבַחֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> and with a spear וּבְכִיד֑וֹן <WH3591> and with a shield וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I בָֽא־ <WH935> but I come אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to you בְּשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> to thee in the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֛י <WH430> the God מַעַרְכ֥וֹת <WH4634> of the armies יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom חֵרַֽפְתָּ׃ <WH2778> whom thou hast defied

הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> This day הַזֶּ֡ה <WH2088> This יְסַגֶּרְךָ֩ <WH5462> deliver יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> will the LORD בְּיָדִ֜י <WH3027> thee into mine hand וְהִכִּיתִ֗ךָ <WH5221> and I will smite וַהֲסִרֹתִ֤י <WH5493> thee and take אֶת־ <WH853> רֹֽאשְׁךָ֙ <WH7218> thine head מֵעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and I וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י <WH5414> from thee and I will give פֶּ֣גֶר <WH6297> the carcases מַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> of the host פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לְע֥וֹף <WH5775> unto the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of the air וּלְחַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and to the wild beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> may know כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> that all the earth כִּ֛י <WH3588> that יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> that there is אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> a God לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> shall know כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקָּהָ֣ל <WH6951> And all this assembly הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֛א <WH3808> by בְּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> not with sword וּבַחֲנִ֖ית <WH2595> and spear יְהוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> saveth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> [is] the LORD'S הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> for the battle וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and he will give אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3027> you into our hands

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> happened כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when קָ֣ם <WH6965> arose הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> And it came to pass when the Philistine וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and came וַיִּקְרַ֖ב <WH7126> and drew nigh לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> to meet דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> hasted דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> that David וַיָּ֥רָץ <WH7323> and ran הַמַּעֲרָכָ֖ה <WH4634> toward the army לִקְרַ֥את <WH7122> to meet הַפְּלִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH6430> the Philistine

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> put דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> his hand אֶל־ <WH413> into הַכֶּ֗לִי <WH3627> in his bag וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> and took מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> it אֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> thence a stone וַיְקַלַּ֔ע <WH7049> and slang וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> [it] and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> the Philistine אֶל־ <WH413> on מִצְח֑וֹ <WH4696> in his forehead וַתִּטְבַּ֤ע <WH2883> sunk הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <WH68> that the stone בְּמִצְח֔וֹ <WH4696> into his forehead וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> and he fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> upon his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the earth

וַיֶּחֱזַ֨ק <WH2388> prevailed דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> So David מִן־ <WH4480> over הַפְּלִשְׁתִּי֙ <WH6430> the Philistine בַּקֶּ֣לַע <WH7050> with a sling וּבָאֶ֔בֶן <WH68> and with a stone וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> the Philistine וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <WH4191> and slew וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> him but [there was] no sword אֵ֥ין <WH369> there בְּיַד־ <WH3027> in the hand דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיָּ֣רָץ <WH7323> ran דָּ֠וִד <WH1732> Therefore David וַיַּעֲמֹ֨ד <WH5975> and stood אֶל־ <WH413> over הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜י <WH6430> upon the Philistine וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֠רְבּוֹ <WH2719> his sword וַֽיִּשְׁלְפָ֤הּ <WH8025> and drew מִתַּעְרָהּ֙ <WH8593> it out of the sheath וַיְמֹ֣תְתֵ֔הוּ <WH4191> thereof and slew וַיִּכְרָת־ <WH3772> him and cut off בָּ֖הּ אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> his head וַיִּרְא֧וּ <WH7200> saw הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <WH6430> therewith And when the Philistines כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֥ת <WH4191> was dead גִּבּוֹרָ֖ם <WH1368> their champion וַיָּנֻֽסוּ׃ <WH5127> they fled

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> arose אַנְשֵׁי֩ <WH376> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> and of Judah וַיָּרִ֗עוּ <WH7321> and shouted וַֽיִּרְדְּפוּ֙ <WH7291> and pursued אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines עַד־ <WH5704> far בּוֹאֲךָ֣ <WH935> until thou come גַ֔יְא <WH1516> to the valley וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> far שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> and to the gates עֶקְר֑וֹן <WH6138> of Ekron וַֽיִּפְּל֞וּ <WH5307> fell down חַֽלְלֵ֤י <WH2491> And the wounded פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שַׁעֲרַ֔יִם <WH8189> to Shaaraim וְעַד־ <WH5704> far גַּ֖ת <WH1661> even unto Gath וְעַד־ <WH5704> far עֶקְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6138> and unto Ekron

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> returned בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִדְּלֹ֖ק <WH1814> from chasing אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיָּשֹׁ֖סּוּ <WH8155> and they spoiled אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4264> their tents

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> the head הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> of the Philistine וַיְבִאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> and brought יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> it to Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> his armour שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> but he put בְּאָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH168> in his tent ס

וְכִרְא֨וֹת <WH7200> saw שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> And when Saul אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David יֹצֵא֙ <WH3318> go forth לִקְרַ֣את <WH7122> against הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> the Philistine אָמַ֗ר <WH559> he said אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְנֵר֙ <WH74> unto Abner שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> the captain הַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> of the host בֶּן־ <WH1121> whose son מִי־ <WH4310> whose זֶ֥ה <WH2088> is this הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> young אַבְנֵ֑ר <WH74> Abner וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> to Abner חֵֽי־ <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> [As] thy soul הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> O king אִם־ <WH518> I cannot יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH3045> tell

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king שְׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> Enquire אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you בֶּן־ <WH1121> thou whose son מִי־ <WH4310> whose זֶ֖ה <WH2088> he הָעָֽלֶם׃ <WH5958> the stripling ס

וּכְשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> returned דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And as David מֵֽהַכּוֹת֙ <WH5221> from the slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6430> of the Philistine וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> אַבְנֵ֔ר <WH74> Abner וַיְבִאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> him and brought לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> him before שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וְרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> with the head הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH6430> of the Philistine בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul בֶּן־ <WH1121> to him Whose son מִ֥י <WH4310> Whose אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> are you הַנָּ֑עַר <WH5288> young וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> I [am] the son עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> of thy servant יִשַׁ֖י <WH3448> Jesse בֵּ֥ית הַלַּחְמִֽי׃ <WH1022> the Bethlehemite
